title: Drawing, Page of a drawing book; Romanesque crucifix; Baptism of Christ; Ascension of Virgin, ca. 1590
title_raw: Page of a drawing book; Romanesque crucifix; Baptism of Christ; Ascension of Virgin
medium:
Verso: Pen and ink on paper
Recto: Pen, ink, black chalk, "C" with gray wash on paper
inscribed: Upper left corner: Pianeta pezze 8...(?) in 4 Romani pezze 6 gia 3 (or 5)/ Santa Maria; Bottom: 6
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Vertical rectangle. Verso: Crucifix in the Romanesque scheme shoes a projected elongation of the arms with the figures of the Virgin and St. John up to the very cross-arms and an interchange of the places of the two figures. Inscription in the upper left corner: "Pianeta pezze 8...(?) in 4 Romani pezze 6 gia 3 (or 5)/ Santa Maria." Verso, top. Recto: Christ is leaving the water; the dove flies over him. The heavens are open and circles of angels are visible. "6" is written below, bottom, horizontally; below: the Virgin is supported by angels. Others accompany her.

participants.person_name: Jan van der Straet, called Stradanus

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Page of a drawing book; Romanesque crucifix; Baptism of Christ; Ascension of Virgin, ca. 1590. Verso: Pen and ink on paper
Recto: Pen, ink, black chalk, "C" with gray wash on paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1069
